revision.text:
'''Ben''' or '''Benjamin Johnson''' may refer to:
*[[Ben Jonson]] (1572–1637), English poet and dramatist *[[Ben Johnson (actor)]] (1918–1996), American actor *[[Ben Johnson (offensive tackle)]] (born 1980), former American football offensive tackle of the National Football League *[[Ben Johnson (tight end)]], American football tight end *[[Ben Johnson (artist)]] (born 1946), British painter *[[Ben Johnson (chairman)]] (1939–2014), American Makah politician *[[Ben Johnson (cricketer)]] (born 1973), Australian cricketer *[[Ben Johnson (footballer)]] (born 1981), Australian rules footballer *[[Ben Johnson (ice hockey)]] (born 1994), American professional ice hockey player *[[Ben Johnson (musician)]] (born 1984), American musician, member of the band 100 Monkeys *[[Ben Johnson (outfielder)]] (born 1981), American Major League Baseball outfielder *[[Ben Johnson (pitcher)]] (born 1931), American former Major League Baseball pitcher *[[Ben Johnson (politician)]] (1858–1950), American lawyer *[[Ben Johnson (soccer)]] (born 1977), American soccer player *[[Ben Johnson (sprinter)]] (born 1961), Canadian sprinter *[[Ben Johnson (American sprinter)]] (1914–1992), American sprinter *[[Ben F. Johnson]] (1914–2006), American politician in Georgia and academic administrator *[[Ben Patrick Johnson]] (born 1969), American voice-over actor, author, and commentator/activist *[[Ben Campbell Johnson]] (1932–2016), American minister and professor *[[Benita Johnson]] (born 1979), Australian distance runner *[[Benjamin Johnson (judge)]] (1784–1849), United States federal judge *[[Benjamin Johnson (rugby league)]], rugby league footballer of the 1910s *[[Benjamin Johnson (actor)]] (1665–1742), English actor *[[Benjamin F. Johnson]] (1818–1905), American Mormon pioneer *[[Benjamin Newhall Johnson]] (1856–1923), American attorney and historian *[[Benton Johnson]] (born 1928), American sociologist *[[Benny Johnson]] (1948–1988), American football defensive back
==Other uses== *[[Ben Johnson (film)|''Ben Johnson'' (film)]], a 2005 Malayalam-language film
==See also== *[[Ben Johnson House (Bardstown, Kentucky)]], listed on the NRHP in Kentucky *[[Ben Johnson House (Flemingsburg Junction, Kentucky)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Fleming County, Kentucky|listed on the NRHP in Fleming County, Kentucky]] *[[Ben Johnston (disambiguation)]]
